title: Reaction
description: A Reaction is a special action taken in response to a trigger defined in the Reaction’s description, which you can take on any turn. Once you take a Reaction, you can’t take another one until the start of your next turn.

contents.name: Opportunity Attack
contents.summary: When a creature that you can see leaves your reach using an action or one of its speeds, you make one melee attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike against the provoking creature. The attack occurs right before the creature leaves your reach.
